dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, September 04, 2005 1:18 PM
To: rachel@rachelaziani.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement
Date: Fri, 02 Sep 2005 14:06:57 -0700
From: rachel <rachel@rachelaziani.com>
To: abuse@servermatrix.com
CC: HOOKUPBOARD.COM@domainsbyproxy.com


>To Whom It May Concern:
>
>It has come to my attention that you have made an unauthorized use of 
>my copyright work entitled Rachel Aziani in the preparation of a work 
>derived therefrom. I have reserved all rights in the Work, first 
>published in June 1999, and have registered copyright therein. Your 
>work entitled "Hook up Board.com" is identical to the Work and clearly used
the Work as its basis.
>
>As you neither asked for nor received permission to use the Work as the 
>basis for Rachel Aziani nor to make or distribute copies, including 
>electronic copies, of same, I believe you have willfully infringed my 
>rights under 17 U.S.C. Section 101 et seq. and could be liable for 
>statutory damages as high as $300,000 as set forth in Section 504(c)(2) 
>therein.
>
>I demand that you immediately cease the use and distribution of all 
>infringing works derived from the Work, and all copies, including 
>electronic copies, of same, that you deliver to me, if applicable, all 
>unused, undistributed copies of same, or destroy such copies 
>immediately and that you desist from this or any other infringement of 
>my rights in the future. If I have not received an affirmative response 
>from you by September 3rd, 2005 indicating that you have fully complied 
>with these requirements, I shall take further action against you.
  Thanks,
>Rachel Aziani

Please contact with me with any questions you might have.
Call 602-614-3575
Or Email me rachel@rachelaziani.com





- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDGzpXvK/XpJs6oyURAhz0AKCL+tCPjDChced18VbzMoRoHMjMsgCgmPvl

=VZnZ
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
